Thank you for your contribution! Please follow the checklist below before submitting a PR.

- [ ] I have added JSDoc to exported public API where it was missing.
- [ ] I ran `npm run typecheck` and fixed any TypeScript issues.
- [ ] I ran `npm run lint` and fixed lint problems.
- [ ] I updated or added tests where applicable and ran `npm run test`.
- [ ] I added or updated documentation or examples if the public API changed.
